description: This file sets up an agent using the agno framework with a Claude model, and demonstrates how to print a response for a given prompt.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent capable of interacting with models and handling responses.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event containing a response chunk from the agent.

classes.name: Claude
classes.description: Represents the Claude model configuration for the agent.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent for a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.
